title: Super Luxury Villa In Beach View [E]
details: This villa is located in near the hikkaduwa. viewing galle road and ocean.very nice villa.complete villa.this villa making by high valuble metirial and timbers. big garden with valuble trees.THIS VILLA WITH GIVING EVERY HIGH VALUBLE FURNITURES.HIGH VAUBLE ELECTRIC METIRIALS.HOT WATER,SOLAR POWER,AIR CONDITION AND MANY METIRIALS.3 ROOMS.2 LARGE BALCANISE.GORAGE.SERVNT ROOMS, DRIVER REST ROOM AND EVERY FACILITIES.
